issue.title: SHOP basket perimeter : string Define/Edit for perimeter button
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Linked to basket enhancement in #643 pricing.
The string in the perimeter button should change depending of perimeter status:
"Define order perimeter" when not set
"Modify order perimeter" when a perimeter has been set (or "edit", what's the most correct verb for that in English ?)

This was defined in #643 (only in html mockup, not in description, sorry about that)

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.3
